short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate personalized and professional cover letters with AI to save time applying for jobs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cover letters are one of the first things that potential employers see when deciding whether to hire you. Make an excellent first impression by generating personalized and professional cover letters with our advanced AI Chrome extension. The extension will use the information about the job and yourself to generate customized cover letters to help you land your dream job.

Process:
1. Provide info about yourself (e.g. copy and paste from resume).
2. Copy and paste the job description.
3. Generate!

Features:
- Personalized cover letters written to suit you and the job
- Professional tone
- Cover letters generated in seconds
- Cutting-edge AI
- Fast and friendly support

If you are wanting to make a great first impression and land your dream job, then start generating professional cover letters with our AI Chrome extension today!
